Task 1

```{r}
if (x <= 0){
  y = -(x^3)
} else if (x > 1){
  y = sqrt(x)
} else {
  y = x^2
}

```

```{r}
# input
x.values <- seq(-2, 2, by = 0.1)

# for each x calculate y
n <- length(x.values)
y.values <- rep(0, n)

for (i in 1:n) {
  x <- x.values[i]

  if (x <= 0){
    y = -(x^3)
  } else if (x > 1){
    y = sqrt(x)
  } else {
    y = x^2
  }

  y.values[i] <- y
}

# output
plot(x.values, y.values, type = "l")
```

Task 2

```{r}
h = function(x, n){
  val = 0
  
  for (i in 0:n){
    val = val + (x^i)
  }
  
  return (val)
}
```
